name: Heroine Anthem Zero Episode 2
description:
Heroine Anthem Zero Episode 2  is an epic fantasy ARPG with full of adventures and stories. 

The story continues with episode 1 of Heroine Anthem Zero. All of the fan-favorite characters are back with a more in-depth development.Players can fight along with their choice of pet and companion, unlock skills and new power-ups, and interact with different puzzles throughout the game. Besides, the storyline unravels its charm with the player's progression in the game with epic soundtrack and beautiful art style as previous series.

We are going to release the demo version of episode 2 in this December. Of course, it will be free.

Come to take a look for the trailer of episode 2 and sign up on our registration page through the link below, You will receive the demo version directly on December 12 at the first moment.

Link to sign up for the free demo: http://www.heroineanthem.com/reg/
